data.eml:eml: New species of the genus Agrilus Curtis, 1825, from Nicaragua and Panamá (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Curletti, Gianfranco (2010): New species of the genus Agrilus Curtis, 1825, from Nicaragua and Panamá (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilinae). Zootaxa 2333: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275491
